jcurses.widgets
类 TextArea

java.lang.Object
  jcurses.widgets.Widget
      jcurses.widgets.TextComponent
          jcurses.widgets.TextArea
所有已实现的接口：
IScrollable
public class TextArea
extends TextComponent
implements IScrollable

This class implements a text area to edit a text with meny lines

构造方法详细信息

TextArea

public TextArea(int width,
                int height,
                java.lang.String text)
The constructor

参数：
width - the preferred width of the component. If -1 is stated, there is no preferred width and the component is layouted dependend on the container and the text
height - the preferred height of the component. If -1 is stated, there is no preferred width and the component is layouted dependend on the container.

TextArea

public TextArea(int width,
                int height)
The constructor

参数：
width - the preferred width of the component. If -1 is stated, there is no preferred width and the component is layouted dependend on the container and the text
height - the preferred height of the component. If -1 is stated, there is no preferred width and the component is layouted dependend on the container.

getTextRectangle

protected Rectangle getTextRectangle()
从类 TextComponent 复制的描述
The method returns the rectangle, within that the text is painted. Is overrided by derived classes for example to implement a border.

覆盖：
类 TextComponent 中的 getTextRectangle

doPaint

protected void doPaint()
从类 Widget 复制的描述
This method paints the widget. Will be called by paint(), only if the widget is visible. Must be implemented be derived classes.

覆盖：
类 TextComponent 中的 doPaint

drawAdditionalThings

protected void drawAdditionalThings()
从类 TextComponent 复制的描述
This method draws text-dependent additional things such as scrollbars. As default it makes nothing, can be overriden in inherited classes ( for example text area)

覆盖：
类 TextComponent 中的 drawAdditionalThings

refreshAdditionalThings

protected void refreshAdditionalThings()
从类 TextComponent 复制的描述
This method refreshes text-dependent additional after a text change such as scrollbars. As default it makes nothing, can be overriden in inherited classes ( for example text area)

覆盖：
类 TextComponent 中的 refreshAdditionalThings

protected Rectangle getPreferredSize()
从类 TextComponent 复制的描述
Aus Widget

覆盖：
类 TextComponent 中的 getPreferredSize

hasHorizontalScrollbar

public boolean hasHorizontalScrollbar()
从接口 IScrollable 复制的描述
This method returns true, if the using widget has a horizontal scrollbar, ( independent of the size of it, this can be also empty)

指定者：
接口 IScrollable 中的 hasHorizontalScrollbar
返回：
true, if the scrollbar is to be paint, false otherwise

hasVerticalScrollbar

public boolean hasVerticalScrollbar()
从接口 IScrollable 复制的描述
This method returns true, if the using widget has a vertical scrollbar, ( independent of the size of it, this can be also empty)

指定者：
接口 IScrollable 中的 hasVerticalScrollbar
返回：
true, if the scrollbar is to be paint, false otherwise

getHorizontalScrollbarOffset

public float getHorizontalScrollbarOffset()
从接口 IScrollable 复制的描述
The method returns the offset of the horizontal scrollbar as part of the length of the side of the border rectangle ( 0 <=value < 1.0 )

指定者：
接口 IScrollable 中的 getHorizontalScrollbarOffset
返回：
